import React, { Component } from "react"; class Home extends Component { render() { return (

As we know pandemics teach us a lot in 2020, So their Two Way Communications take birth in 2020, I have decided to quit my job with a language translation agency.

I was worked in the Finance and Marketing field with various industries such as Automobile, Pharmaceuticals, E-Commerce, Banking & Finance Sectors, Printing & Packaging, Foods, and Beverages, Advertising, Media, Computer Training, Education Sectors.

I have noticed that there is one common thing in the field, that is a language barrier to deliver their message to reach the customers, after that I have served some years to a language translation agency and analyzed the market and how can I deliver the communicable translation for various company accordingly their industry, so they reach their target audience quickly.

“We are now well understanding the client requirements and their moto for advertising and promotions of the products”{" "}

Two Way Communications is now working for some reputed companies, agencies, and brands within India in less than two years.{" "}

); } } export default Home;
